title: Sidewall - Fragment, ca. 1860
description: Vertical repeat in dark neutral colors similar to a verdure tapestry. Landscape paper showing children, two boys and two girls, at a see-saw, surrounded by foliage.  Printed in greens, red, blues and browns. Vertical, a full width, composed of two joined fragments.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall - Fragment, ca. 1860.
ca. 1860. Machine-printed. Gift of Grace Lincoln Temple. 1938-62-55.
